frame.name: People_by_military_specialty
frame.definition:
<def-root>The LUs in this frame refer to <fen>Fighter</fen> in <fen>Military_organization</fen>s according to their specialty in general or their function at a particular place and time. The <fen>Fighter</fen> may be part of a nation-state's armed forces or may be a member of an irregular military organization.
<ex>The IED injured the left door <t><fex name="Fighter">gunner</fex></t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Fighter</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Fighter</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Fighter</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Fighter</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Fighter</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition:
<def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Fighter</fen> is associated.
<ex>Is she the <t>sniper</t> <fex name="coa">from the movie we saw last night</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Rank
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Fighter</fen> may have a <fen>Rank</fen> in the formal or informal military organization to which s/he belongs.
<ex>Robin was the <fex name="rnk">highest-ranking</fex> <t>gunner</t> at the scene.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place_of_operation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Fighter</fen> is stationed, or primarily operates from.</def-root>

FE.name: Loyal_side
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Fighter</fen> belongs to the military of the <fen>Loyal_side</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a more specific <fen>Type</fen> of specialty that the <fen>Fighter</fen> has.</def-root>

FE.name: Compensation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Fighter</fen> receives for performing military service.</def-root>

FE.name: Contract_basis
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Contract_basis</fen> describes the conditions of military membership with respect to permanency, time or duration of duty, payment basis, and so on.</def-root>

FE.name: Military_organization
FE.definition:
<def-root>The military organization to which the <fen>Fighter</fen> belongs.
<ex>My friend is a <fex name="mil">US Navy</fex> <t><fex name="Fighter">engineer</fex></t>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: gunner.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a member of the military who operates artillery.

lexUnit.name: sniper.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person who operates a weapon that can shoot targets from a distance or from a concealed position.

lexUnit.name: signaller.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a military specialist in communications.

lexUnit.name: infantryman.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a soldier trained in fighting on foot and face-to-face with the enemy.
